summary: A woman goes on a journey to find her lover after his plane disappears in the Sahara.
cast: Marion Cotillard|Guillaume Canet|Guillaume Marquet|Fred Epaud|Saïdou Abatcha|Michaël Vander-Meiren|Nabil Imtital|Halimata Graille|Mohamed Kounda|Mohamed Ixa|Swann Arlaud|Ben Aïssa El Jirari|Robert Hoehn
title: El último vuelo
